1: Do your best impression of a famous celebrity, and let the other players guess who you are imitating.
2: Sing a song of your choice in a public place.
3: Go outside and do a silly dance for at least 30 seconds.
4: Text or call your crush and confess your feelings to them.
5: Eat a spoonful of hot sauce or chili peppers, even if you can't handle spicy foods.
6: Walk up to a stranger and ask them for a high-five or a hug.
7: Put on a blindfold and let someone feed you a mystery food.
8: Go to a public place and ask a stranger to take a selfie with you.
9: Wear your clothes inside out for the rest of the game.
10: Do 10 push-ups, 10 sit-ups, and 10 squats in 30 seconds.
